setContent

public void setContent(String html)
Description copied from interface: HasInfoWindowOptions
Content to display in the InfoWindow. This can be a plain-text string, or a string containing HTML. The InfoWindow will be sized according to the content.

Specified by:
setContent in interface HasInfoWindowOptions

setDisableAutoPan

public void setDisableAutoPan(boolean disableAutoPan)
Description copied from interface: HasInfoWindowOptions
Disable auto-pan on open. By default, the info window will pan the map so that it is fully visible when it opens.

Specified by:
setDisableAutoPan in interface HasInfoWindowOptions

setMaxWidth

public void setMaxWidth(int maxWidth)
Description copied from interface: HasInfoWindowOptions
Maximum width of the infowindow, regardless of content's width. This value is only considered if it is set before a call to open. To change the maximum width when changing content, call close, setOptions, and then open.

Specified by:
setMaxWidth in interface HasInfoWindowOptions

setPixelOffset

public void setPixelOffset(HasSize size)
Description copied from interface: HasInfoWindowOptions
The offset, in pixels, of the tip of the info window from the point on the map at whose geographical coordinates the info window is anchored. If an InfoWindow is opened with an anchor, the pixelOffset will be calculated from the top-center of the anchor's bounds.

Specified by:
setPixelOffset in interface HasInfoWindowOptions

setPosition

public void setPosition(HasLatLng position)
Description copied from interface: HasInfoWindowOptions
The LatLng at which to display this InfoWindow. If the InfoWindow is opened with an anchor, the anchor's position will be used instead.

Specified by:
setPosition in interface HasInfoWindowOptions

setZIndex

public void setZIndex(int zIndex)
Description copied from interface: HasInfoWindowOptions
All InfoWindows are displayed on the map in order of their zIndex, with higher values displaying in front of InfoWindows with lower values. By default, InfoWinodws are displayed according to their latitude, with InfoWindows of lower latitudes appearing in front of InfoWindows at higher latitudes. InfoWindows are always displayed in front of markers.

Specified by:
setZIndex in interface HasInfoWindowOptions

getJso

public com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject getJso()
Specified by:
getJso in interface HasJso
